trans-unit.resname: SCG·119 | Fierce Empath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用大于或等于6的生物牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Forgotten Ancient
trans-unit.target: 遗世先人

trans-unit.resname: SCG·120 | Forgotten Ancient | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from CARDNAME onto other creatures.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手使用咒语时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 在你的维持开始时，你可以将CARDNAME上任意数量的+1/+1指示物移至其他生物上。

trans-unit.source: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.
trans-unit.target: 血涌生命，体散活力。

trans-unit.source: Hunting Pack
trans-unit.target: 行猎兽群

trans-unit.resname: SCG·121 | Hunting Pack | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token into play.\nStorm (When you play this spell, copy it for each spell played before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 将一个4/4绿色野兽衍生物放置进场。 风暴（当你使用此咒语时，本回合于此咒语之前每使用过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。）

trans-unit.source: Krosan Drover
trans-unit.target: 克洛萨驱兽人

trans-unit.resname: SCG·122 | Krosan Drover | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you play with converted mana cost 6 or more cost {2} less to play.
trans-unit.target: 由你使用之生物咒语，且总法术力费用大于或等于6者，其费用减少{2}来使用。

trans-unit.source: "Sit."
trans-unit.target: 「坐下。」

trans-unit.source: Krosan Warchief
trans-unit.target: 克洛萨战酋长

trans-unit.resname: SCG·123 | Krosan Warchief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Beast spells you play cost {1} less to play.\n{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
trans-unit.target: 你使用的野兽咒语费用减少{1}来使用。 {1}{G}：重生目标野兽。

trans-unit.source: It turns prey into predator.
trans-unit.target: 他让猎物变成猎者。

trans-unit.source: Kurgadon
trans-unit.target: 克加敦兽

trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a creature spell with converted mana cost 6 or more, put three +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手使用总法术力费用大于或等于6的生物咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置三个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: When it walks through Krosa, trees step aside, leaves take wing, and the ground shudders.
trans-unit.target: 当他漫游于克洛萨境内，树木靠边站开，树叶纷飞逃离，大地瑟瑟颤栗。

trans-unit.resname: SCG·125 | One with Nature | Card Name
trans-unit.source: One with Nature
trans-unit.target: 自然调合

trans-unit.resname: SCG·125 | One with Nature | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌并将其横置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Primitive Etchings
trans-unit.target: 原始蚀刻

trans-unit.resname: SCG·126 | Primitive Etchings | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a creature card this way, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 展示你每回合抓到的第一张牌。每当你以此法展示出生物牌时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Ancient carvings in the trees of Krosa glow with power once again.
trans-unit.target: 克洛萨树上的古老雕刻再度发出力量的光芒。

trans-unit.source: Root Elemental
trans-unit.target: 生机元素

trans-unit.resname: SCG·127 | Root Elemental | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Morph {5}{G}{G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, you may put a creature card from your hand into play.
trans-unit.target: 变身{5}{G}{G}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，你可以从你手上将一张生物牌放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.\nStorm (When you play this spell, copy it for each spell played before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。 风暴（当你使用此咒语时，本回合于此咒语之前每使用过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。）

trans-unit.source: Trample\nMorph {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 变身{4}{G}{G}{G}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: With natural laws abandoned, excess thrives.
trans-unit.target: 自然法则已然毁弃，贪食者横行天下。

trans-unit.source: Treetop Scout
trans-unit.target: 树顶斥候

trans-unit.resname: SCG·130 | Treetop Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被具飞行异能的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: At home among the swaying, supple branches of the treetops, some scouts live their entire lives never touching ground.
trans-unit.target: 斥候住在树顶摇晃而柔韧的家中，有些终其一生未曾碰过地面。

trans-unit.source: Upwelling
trans-unit.target: 涌升

trans-unit.source: Mana pools don't empty at the end of phases or turns. (This effect stops mana burn.)
trans-unit.target: 法术力池在阶段或回合结束时不会清空。（此效应阻止法术力灼伤。）

trans-unit.source: Once again, Kamahl felt the full force of the Mirari's pull, but he had learned much since the last time.
trans-unit.target: 卡马尔再度感到映奇宝珠传来的强烈吸引力，但之前的教训已让他学到了很多。

trans-unit.target: 循环树林{2}（{2}，从你手上弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张树林牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Tall as a tree and probably related.
trans-unit.target: 如树般高大，而且八成有血缘关系。

trans-unit.target: 以疲劳感为食。

trans-unit.source: Morph {2}{G}{G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，防御牌手本回合不能使用咒语。

trans-unit.source: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.
trans-unit.target: 沾上身后，除了扯掉他们，你不会有其他的念头。

trans-unit.target: 敏捷 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手重置CARDNAME并获得其操控权。 每当卡若娜攻击时，选择一种生物类别，该类别的生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。
